attributes.action: reduce the waiting time for the re-entry into uk for pets using the pet passport scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the review of pet passports.
1...waiting time for re-entry into the UK after the the rabies blood test to be reduced from 6 months to 3months

2...The Tick and worming treatment window to be extended to 10 days.

3...Search and Rescue dogs be allowed re-entry without quarantine from anywhere in the world provided they have a current pet passport. When returning from a non-listed country a muzzle must be worned in public for a period of 12 weeks when not working for the purpose of which the dog was trained.

4.....Registered Assistance Dogs and Guide Dogs must have a current pet passport and the conditions for re-enry from a non-listed country be the same as those for Search and Rescue dogs.
